Description: Rim sherd of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centre; exterior: diagonal stroke pattern between pairs of lines. Probably inscription on inside.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 290, no. 881)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1016) (phase 2)
